title: Hero MotoCorp sold 5.12 lac units of motorcycles and scooters in August this year
description: Hero MotoCorp reported sales of 512,360 motorcycles and scooters in August 2024, with domestic sales reaching 492,263 units. The company noted supply shortages affected August sales but expects recovery in September. Year-to-date sales have increased by 8% compared to the same period in the previous financial year. The company is gearing up for the festive season and has expanded its global presence by starting operations in the Philippines.
